name: tapInput
signature: { <In2, X, R2>(f: (input: In2) => Effect<X, never, R2>): <Out, In, R>(self: Schedule<Out, In, R>) => Schedule<Out, In & In2, R2 | R>; <Out, In, R, In2, X, R2>(self: Schedule<Out, In, R>, f: (input: In2) => Effect<X, never, R2>): Schedule<Out, In & In2, R | R2>; }
description:
Returns a new schedule that runs the given effectful function for each input
before continuing execution.
*Details This function allows side effects to be performed on each input processed by
the schedule. It does not modify the schedule’s behavior but ensures that the
provided function `f` runs before each step.
